mapper.select: SELECT a.messageno as messageno, a.title as title, a.contents as contents, a.recv_member as recv_member, a.send_member as send_member, a.s_date as s_date,a.productno as productno, b.mname as sender FROM message a, member b WHERE a.recv_member=#{recv_member} and a.send_member = b.memberno
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message(messageno, title, contents, recv_member, send_member, s_date, productno) VALUES(MESSAGE_SEQ.nextval, #{title}, #{contents}, #{recv_member} , #{send_member}, sysdate, #{productno})
